reviewText: From the cheap production values, boring visuals, bland script, and uncritically celebratory attitude, you'd think that this was a cheap 1980s TV infommercial for the King and Prince Hotel, but it was made in 2008. Much of it consists of  interviews with the hotel manager and a local resident. Although I had stayed at the King and Prince many times when I was a kid, even I was bored by this "documentary" and found myself fast forwarding through many segments.
